basics.name: Dan Spector
basics.label: Front-end engineering, data visualization, data journalism
basics.summary: I’m a front-end software engineer with a passion for design, data visualization, and interactive experiences that educate and inspire. I have a master’s degree in information design and data visualization. I’m very excited about the intersection of data, design, and code. Most of my work utilizes HTML, CSS, modular JavaScript, Node.js, D3, and modern declarative frameworks like React and Svelte.

work.summary: I create interactive projects for readers at McKinsey.com, working with publishing stakeholders at a top consulting firm.
highlights: Craft delightful public-facing projects showcasing McKinsey research
Collaborate in a multidisciplinary team of editors, writers, and designers
Highlights include “McKinsey for Kids”, “Do You Know Your Life’s Purpose?”, and “Diversity and Inclusion in the U.S. Fashion Industry”

work.summary: I created static and interactive graphics in a newsroom environment, as well as performed data analysis.
highlights: Developed interactive graphics in a modern JavaScript environment using React and D3
Tamed and interpreted datasets with R
Produced graphics for print on deadline with Illustrator
Led development on a project about college debt that received over 3 million views

work.summary: I created visual, data-driven applications in a studio environment as part of my graduate studies.
highlights: Developed an interactive thesis about why the penny should be eliminated
Analyzed the U.S. craft beer industry according to geography, beer style, and chemistry
Visualized rent poverty in a gentrifying neighborhood of Boston

work.summary: I produced video and social media content for a company promoting women’s corporate leadership development.
highlights: Crafted a speaker reel for the CEO, spending months iterating and revising footage
Edited video from conferences about women in the workplace issues and female executive career growth
Revamped company marketing strategy on social media
